OVERVIEW
=========================================================
This directory contains source code for version 1.1.3 of C/C++ Minpack, 3rd party software for solving nonlinear equations and nonlinear least squares problems.

The original version of Minpack was written in Fortran by Jorge Moré, Burt Garbow, and Ken Hillstrom at Argonne National Laboratory. The C/C++ version is distributed by Frederick Devernay.

See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MINPACK.


SOURCE
==========================================================
Downloaded 8/22/11 by MG from 
http://devernay.free.fr/hacks/cminpack/cminpack.html

The original filename was cminpack-1.1.3.tar.gz. This directory contains all files from that archive as they were downloaded.
